ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
@put:{n:"[property$=book_name]@content",
a:"[property$=author]@content",
c:"[property~=category|status|update_time]@content",
l:"[property$=latest_chapter_name]@content||[property$=lastest_chapter_name]@content",
d:"[property$=description]@content",
i:"[property$=image]@content",
t:"text.点击查看更多@href"}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

ruleSearch.author: .author@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if(result.match(/Just a moment/)){
cookie.removeCookie(source.bookSourceUrl)
var x=java.get("url");
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(x,"验证").body();
result=s;
	}else{
		result=result;
		}
	result;
</js>
.bookbox
ruleSearch.name: .bookname@text##\[.*]
